pages.text: In times of power scarcity, finding zombies close to a shelter in the dark becomes a tricky issue. In movies, radar is often used to precisely locate the enemy's position, so why can't we borrow from that? You might think I'm joking, but ultra-wideband radar can really do it. Now, all you need is to find someone who can
stay awake at night. Moreover, this portable radar can also be used to scavenge for supplies and find out in advance if there are any zombies planning a big surprise!
